title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for meaning of the expression

1 point is earned for trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for estimate

1 10 ∫ 0 10 H(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4230@ is the average temperature of the tea, in degrees Celsius, over the 10 minutes.

1 10 ∫ 0 10 H(t) dt ≈ 1 10 ( 2⋅ 66+60 2 +3⋅ 60+52 2 +4⋅ 52+44 2 +1⋅ 44+33 2 )                          =52.95 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7DAF@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the value of integral

1 point is earned for meaning of the expression

∫ 0 10 H ′ (t) dt =H(10)−H(0)=43−66=−23 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@50CE@

The temperature of the tea drops 23 degrees Celsius from time t = 0 to time t = 10 minutes.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for integrand

1 point is earned for using B(0) = 100

1 point is earned for answer B(10)=100+ ∫ 0 10 B ′ (t) dt =34.18275; H(10)−H(0)=8.817 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5C1A@

The biscuits are 8.817 degrees Celsius cooler than the tea.
